objects.description: [Triada](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0424) is able to modify code within the com.android.systemui application to gain access to `GET_REAL_TASKS` permissions. This permission enables access to information about applications currently on the foreground and other recently used apps.(Citation: Google Triada June 2019)

external_references.description: Lukasz Siewierski. (2019, June 6). PHA Family Highlights: Triada. Retrieved July 16, 2019.
